mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget.BUDGET (user_id, foodBgt, shoppingBgt, cafeBgt, trafficBgt, financialBgt, cultureBgt, medicalBgt, subscribeBgt, lifeBgt, congratulations) VALUES(#{userId}, #{food}, #{shopping}, #{cafe}, #{traffic}, #{financial}, #{culture}, #{medical}, #{subscribe}, #{life}, #{congratulations})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, foodBgt AS food, shoppingBgt AS shopping, cafeBgt AS cafe, trafficBgt AS traffic, financialBgt AS financial, cultureBgt AS culture, medicalBgt AS medical, subscribeBgt AS subscribe, lifeBgt AS life, congratulations FROM BUDGET;
